name: STOCK_IPO
description: Your company is now publicly traded!

name: 100K_INDIVIDUAL_CAR_YEAR
description: You sold 100,000 vehicles of the same model in one fiscal year on Base City, North America, Europe, or Classic Map.

name: 250K_INDIVIDUAL_CAR_YEAR
description: You sold 250,000 vehicles of the same model in one fiscal year on Base City, North America, Europe, or Classic Map.

name: 500K_INDIVIDUAL_CAR_YEAR
description: You sold 500,000 vehicles of the same model in one fiscal year on Base City, North America, Europe, or Classic Map.

name: 1M_INDIVIDUAL_CAR_YEAR
description: You sold 1,000,000 vehicles of the same model in one fiscal year on Base City, North America, Europe, or Classic Map.

name: 1M_INDIVIDUAL_CAR_LIFE
description: You sold at least 1,000,000 vehicles of the same model in a lifetime on Base City, North America, Europe, or Classic Map.

name: 5M_INDIVIDUAL_CAR_LIFE
description: You sold at least 5,000,000 vehicles of the same model in a lifetime on Base City, North America, Europe, or Classic Map.

name: 10M_INDIVIDUAL_CAR_LIFE
description: You sold at least 10,000,000 vehicles of the same model in a lifetime on Base City, North America, Europe, or Classic Map.

name: 25M_INDIVIDUAL_CAR_LIFE
description: You sold at least 25,000,000 vehicles of the same model in a lifetime on Base City, North America, Europe, or Classic Map.

name: 1M_COMPANY_SALES_YEAR
description: You sold 1,000,000 vehicles in a year while playing Base City, North America, Europe, or Classic Map.

name: 5M_COMPANY_SALES_YEAR
description: You sold 5,000,000 vehicles in a year while playing Base City, North America, Europe, or Classic Map.

name: 10M_COMPANY_SALES_YEAR
description: You sold 10,000,000 vehicles in a year while playing Base City, North America, Europe, or Classic Map.

name: 25M_COMPANY_SALES_YEAR
description: You sold 25,000,000 vehicles in a year while playing Base City, North America, Europe, or Classic Map.

name: 1M_MANUFACTURED
description: You have manufactured over 1,000,000 vehicles while playing Base City, North America, Europe, or Classic Map.

name: 20M_MANUFACTURED
description: You have manufactured over 20,000,000 vehicles while playing Base City, North America, Europe, or Classic Map.

name: 100M_MANUFACTURED
description: You have manufactured over 100,000,000 vehicles while playing Base City, North America, Europe, or Classic Map.

name: 250M_MANUFACTURED
description: You have manufactured over 250,000,000 vehicles while playing Base City, North America, Europe, or Classic Map.

name: 500M_MANUFACTURED
description: You have manufactured over 500,000,000 vehicles while playing Base City, North America, Europe, or Classic Map.

name: 1M_FY_PROFITS_BEFORE1910
description: You’ve reached $1,000,000 in yearly profits before 1910. Your company is growing rapidly in the fledgling automobile industry.

name: 100M_FY_PROFITS_BEFORE1950
description: You’ve reached $100,000,000 in yearly profits before 1950. This is inline with historical market leaders at the time.

name: 2B_FY_PROFITS_BEFORE1980
description: You’ve reached $2 billion in yearly profits before 1980. Inflation is driving up the costs, but you're managing grow faster!

name: 25B_FY_PROFITS_BEFOREEND
description: You’ve reached $25 billion in yearly profits. This is inline with the most profitable car manufactures in modern history.

name: 100M_MARKETCAP_BY1920
description: Your company is worth $100,000,000 before 1920! Only a few vehicle manufacturers were able to reach this amount in this time period.

name: 1B_MARKETCAP
description: Your market cap hit $1 Billion Dollars! By modern standards, this is a small company. But it's still quite a milestone, especially during the middle of the century.

name: 50B_MARKETCAP
description: You've hit a value of $50 Billion! This is by definition a large company in modern times. And is roughly what most major vehicle manufacturing companies are worth as of this writing.

name: 250B_MARKETCAP
description: Very few companies have a $250 Bilion market cap. And only one auto manufacture as of this writing is anywhere close to $250 Billion. Congratulations, You would be considered the most valuable car company in the world!

name: 1T_MARKETCAP
description: As of 2018, no auto manufacturer has reached a $1 Trillion dollar market cap. You are an amazing CEO! Congratulations on being the first company ever to reach this mark!

name: BOUGHT_A_COMPANY
description: Showing off your aggression for growth, you bought another company.

name: CONSOLIDATED
description: If you can't beat them, join them!

name: CREATED_MARQUE
description: A wise CEO separates his strengths from his weaknesses.

name: DISCONTINUED_MARQUE
description: At some point, it's better to just get rid of them than to continue to throw money at the problem.

name: BORROWED_MONEY
description: You can never have enough money. We'll pay this back someday.

name: PAID_BACK_MONEY
description: See! We make good on our promises, Mr. Creditor.

name: USED_GUN
description: When things started to look bad, instead of fixing them, you took the easy way out.

name: 50P_LOBBYING
description: Greasing the wheels of government, one politician at a time.

name: 50P_MARKETING
description: You just need a spokesman in a turtleneck with a catchy phase to make billions! Hit 50% overall effectiveness in all the cities you market in.

name: LOSEANTITRUST
description: In the interest of preserving free and unfettered competition, the government slapped your company with Antitrust violations.

name: WIN_ANTITRUST
description: You have shown that you are not abusing your monopoly powers or engaging in anti-competitive practices. At least that's what the jury thinks. In reality, your legal team is just really good at their jobs.

name: STRIKE_ADVERTED
description: Union leaders generally don't care about their workers. They care about power, perks, politics, and personal wealth. If you provide those to the right people and throw a bone to the workers, strikes like these can be averted.

name: WON_LAWSUIT
description: They sue for damages. They sue for trauma. They sue for emotional pain and suffering. They sue for themselves and they sue for lost loved ones... And they get NOTHING!

name: FIRED
description: Unfortunately the board has decided to go in a different direction. You're fired.

name: MUNITIONS
description: You can't fight a shooting war without bullets.

name: ARMY_CONTRACT
description: Stick a gun on it and paint it olive green.

name: AIR_CONTRACT
description: While it might not be a flying car, our engines can still make you fly!

name: NAVAL_CONTRACT
description: The wet and salty conditions of the Ocean are no match for our engine designs.

name: RACING_CONTRACT
description: We're the official supplier of a racing team or series.

name: BAILED_OUT
description: The government has deemed you too big to fail. They have stuffed your bank accounts with tax payer money.

name: FACTORY_FIRE
description: We didn't light the fire! It was always burning since the world's been turning.

name: PROTESTED
description: You hit a nerve and now anti-business types are protesting outside your doors.

name: WON_RACING_SERIES
description: You've won the championship of a world famous racing series with 5 or more entries.

name: PERFECT_CAR
description: You completed a vehicle design with an overall rating greater than 70.

name: FAST_CAR
description: You've designed a vehicle with a top speed of 250mph (402kmh) or greater.

name: Cheap_Car
description: You designed a vehicle with a material cost less than the global per capita.

name: Each_Type
description: Your company has designed one vehicle of each vehicle type.

name: Five_Gens
description: Release at least five generations of the same vehicle over 40 years or more.

name: 100_Years
description: Your company is 100 years old!

name: DEPRESSION_FIN
description: The Great Depression wrecked havoc on the global economy. Your company is one of the few to survive it.

name: WW1_FIN
description: Through rationing, material shortages, and outright banning sales, The Great War destroyed many brass era automobile manufacturers. But yours survived.

name: WW2_FIN
description: There were many winners and losers in World War Two. If your company survived, you were among the winners.

name: BANKRUPT
description: You failed. Don't worry, 98% of companies do in their first few years of business. If it's any consolation, have an achievement.

name: 5YR_MARKETSHARE
description: Your company has maintained the highest yearly market share for five years!

name: AFRICA_5YEARS
description: Your African founded company has maintained the highest yearly market share in the world for 5 years.

name: ELECTRIC
description: Electric vehicles are now the most popular "fuel" type in the world. Thanks to yours and other's efforts.

name: Steam_Powered
description: It's kind of like a tea kettle on wheels.

name: Global_Company
description: You are truely a global company. You have a branch and factory in every region.

name: Licensed_Design
description: Sometimes it's easier to just copy someone else's work.

name: Megacorporation
description: You're so big, you put little countries to shame. You have 6 active marques, world wide branch coverage, at least 10,000,000 sales per year, and you have held the top market share position for at least 5 years against at more than 250 AI on Hard or Nightmare mode.

name: RandomGame
description: ΑΝΕΡΡΙΦΘΩΚΥΒΟC

name: Overtime
description: End of the game? Time to retire? Bah! I want to keep playing!!!

name: Fire_Strikers
description: "When the president said no, American business leaders were given a lesson in managerial leadership that they could not and did not ignore." -  Donald J. Devine

name: Nightmare
description: "What's the trouble in there, Nemo? Go to sleep!"  You've survived 100 years playing on Base City Map, Full AI, on Nightmare mode.

name: Wallstreet_Raider
description: Who said you need to sell cars? Have a $25 Billion Net Worth without selling, buying, or acquiring a vehicle or component design.

name: Quick_Growth
description: Hit $100 million market cap by 1920 on Hard or Nightmare mode, Full AI, and Base City Map.

name: Hyper_Luxury
description: Do not design a vehicle with less than 50 Luxury rating. Sell over $100 Billion worth of Luxury Sedans, Limos, Landonets, and Town Cars on Hard or Nightmare mode, Full AI, Base City Map.

name: 100T_Revs
description: Over the entire life of your company, you hit $10 Trillion Gross Revenues! You did this playing on Hard or Nightmare difficulty, Full AI, on Base City Map.

name: Missdial
description: Uhm, Yeah...

name: RagsToRiches
description: Go from negative cash funds to the richest company in the world.

name: 2K_Designs
description: Design 2000 vehicles over the life of your company.

name: Alexandre_Darracq
description: Base City or Classic Map, 300+ AI, French Company, sell 4,000 vehicles and hold 10% marketshare in France by 1904.

name: Andre_Citroen
description: Base City or Classic Map, Hard Mode, 300+ AI, Paris France based, starting between 1919 to 1922 produce 250,000 vehicles, become the largest French based manufacturer, and the 4th largest in the world by 1932.

name: Assar_Gabrielsson
description: Base City or Classic Map, 300+ AI, Swedish Company, starting in 1920, sell 50,000 in Sweden vehicles by 1941.

name: British_Racing_Green
description: Base City or Classic Map, 300+ AI,  London UK based, starting in 1920, create a 3L to 3.5L Inline 4 Cylinder Engine. Win 5 championships with this engine.

name: Charles_T_Jeffery
description: Sell 10,000 units to militaries via the contracting system by 1919.

name: David_Buick
description: By 1910, produce an OHV (I-Head) engine and go bankrupt.

name: Edward_Holden
description: Base City Or Classic Map, 300+ AI, Australian based company, sell 10 Million units and become the biggest manufacturer in Australia.

name: Edward_Jordan
description: Base City or Classic Map, hard mode, 300+ AI, Cleveland, USA based company. Starting in 1916, sell 30,000 vehicles using only outsourced components.

name: Ettore_Bugattis
description: As a French or German company, starting before 1910, produce only sports cars and win 30 championships before 1947.

name: Ferdinand_Porsche
description: Base City or Classic Map, Stuttgart German company. Starting between 1930-1935, win at least 3 German tank contracts by 1945, have at least 5 active rear engine, rear wheel drive vehicles, and sell 100,000 vehicles.

name: Frederick_Duesenberg
description: As an American company, create an inline (straight) 8 cylinder engine. Use that engine in a luxury sedan with a material cost above $9,000 and sell 5,000 vehicles by 1930.

name: Henry_Ford
description: As a Detroit, USA company, sell 15 million vehicles by 1930 on hard mode, with 300+ AI.

name: Henry_Leland
description: Base City or Classic Map, normal mode, 300+ AI, Detroit USA, starting before 1905, sell 5,000 vehicles and do not design a vehicle with less than 40 luxury ratings by 1922. Do not go bankrupt before 1923.

name: Henry_Royce
description: As a British company, do not design a vehicle with less than 50 quality and reliability rating. Also design a 15L or higher V12 engine by 1914.

name: Herbert_Austin
description: Base City or Classic Map, London, UK based company, produce 17 different models, munitions during WW1, and sell at least 25,000 in a single year by 1926.

name: Howard_Marmon
description: Win the first Independent 500 in the year 1911 with 300+ AI.

name: Italian_Stallion
description: Starting in 1929, as an Italian company, produce only sports and super cars. And win 50 racing championships.

name: Japanese_Businessman
description: Base City or Classic Map, 300+ AI, Japan based, starting between 1945 to 1949, sell 10 Million vehicles and become the best selling brand in North America.

name: Johann_Puch
description: Base City or Classic Map, 300+ AI, Hard Mode, Austrian company, become the largest Austrian based company in the world.  Create and sell 15 different vehicle types. All before 1914.

name: John_And_Horace
description: As an American company, outsource an engine and a gearbox to two different competitors by 1904.

name: Jujiro_Matsuda
description: As a Japanese company, with 300+ AI, sell 1 million vehicles. Use a Wankel engine in a vehicle, and have the best selling roadster in the world.

name: Jules_de_Dion
description: As a Paris, France company, with 300+ AI on Base City or Classic Map, sell 100,000 vehicles and Outsource or License engines to 10 different companies by 1930. Be the largest manufacturer by total sales numbers before 1909.

name: Karl_Benz
description: By 1909, sell 15,000 vehicles and create a 200 HP vehicle.

name: Karl_Rapp
description: As a German company on Base City or Classic Map, win a German Airforce contract by 1918.

name: Lightweight_Engineering
description: As a British company with 300+ AI, do not produce a vehicle that weighs more than 3000lbs. Also win 50 racing championships.

name: Limitless_Korea
description: As a Korean company on Base City or Classic Map with 300+ AI, sell 5 Million vehicles, become the top manufacturer in Korea and a top 10 manufacturer in the world.

name: Lionel_Martin
description: Starting as a London, UK company before 1913, on Base City or Classic Map, sell 100,000 vehicles and produce at least 10 touring models.

name: Louis_Renault
description: Starting as a Paris, France company on Base City or Classic Map, become the largest French Manufacturer, produce munitions during WW1, have a factory seized during WW2, and produce 1 Million vehicles by 1945.

name: Ransom_Eli_Olds
description: On Base City or Classic Map, with 300+ AI, sell 19,000 Phaetons by 1907.

name: Robert_McLaughlin
description: As a Canadian company, on Base City or Classic Map, with 300+ AI, starting before 1910, sell 5 Million vehicles and become the best selling vehicle brand in Canada.

name: Stainless_Steel
description: Playing Hard Mode, as a Belfast, UK company on Base City or Classic Map, create a sports car as your first vehicle using an outsourced engine and gearbox.

name: Toyoda_Kiichiro
description: As a Nagoya, Japan company starting in 1900 on Base City or Classic Map, with 300+ AI and Hard Mode, become the largest company by production for a year after WW2 and sell 20 Million total cars.

name: Two_Worlds_Combined
description: On Normal Mode, Base City or Classic Map, with 300+ AI, as French or Japanese company, consolidate with a company opposite of yours.

name: Walchand_Hirachand
description: Starting the game as an Indian company on Normal mode, sell 1 Million vehicles and produce vehicles in India.

name: Walter_Chrysler
description: Starting between 1919 and 1921, sell 25,000 vehicles, create two marques, and take over two companies before 1930.

name: Wilhelm_Maybach
description: As a German company, starting in 1920 with 300+ AI, sell 300 Luxury Sedans with a V6 Engine and material cost above $3,000. Also sell 50 Luxury Sedan with a V12 and material costs above $5,000 by 1936.

name: William_Durant
description: As an American company on Normal Mode, acquire or create 25 marques by 1930.
